name: Mine Your Own Business
description:
This game is my entry for the 41th LD.
The theme was :"Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".
I tried to combine dungeon crawler (or rogue-like) similiar to the binding of isaac to coockie clicker.
It was my first ever finished project all done by myself (except the music who was made by Marco Ruscone)
I learned a lot so, even if it suck (i know it, don't lie to me) it has been very interesting and inspiring!

INSTRUCTIONS
wasd or arrow keys to move
space or left mouse to attack
esc to exit
there is no save
